common: Hypersensivity to Asteraceae/Compositae plants, chrysanthemums, daisies, marigolds, ragweed
Autoimmune disorders, collagenosis/collagen disease, HIV/AIDS, leukosis, multiple sclerosis, tuberculosis
Atopic conditions, concurrent CYP 3A4 substrates, pregnancy

description.common: echinacea decreases effects of beclomethasone, inhaled by pharmacodynamic antagonism. Avoid or Use Alternate Drug. Monitor for reduced efficacy of immunosuppressant when used concomitantly.
adalimumab increases and echinacea decreases immunosuppressive effects; risk of infection. Effect of interaction is not clear, use caution. Use Caution/Monitor.

echinacea decreases effects of hydroxyurea by Other (see comment). Use Caution/Monitor. 
Comment: Echinacea may decrease therapeutic effects of immunosuppressants.

echinacea decreases effects of ifosfamide by Other (see comment). Use Caution/Monitor. 
Comment: Echinacea is reported possess immunostimulatory activity demonstrated by activation of macrophages (releasing interleukin-1), and proliferation of B-lymphocytes; theoretically, may oppose the therapeutic effects of immunosuppressants.
